pr_title: Use ZosmfServiceV2 only if the authentication endpoint exists

timeline.message:
Use ZosmfServiceV2 only if the authentication endpoint exists

Signed-off-by: Petr Plavjanik <plavjanik@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: This was necessary to make it work on March 28 before the daylight savings time changed.
timeline.author: plavjanik

timeline.bodyText: Is it reasonable expectation that the V1 will be always supported?
timeline.author: balhar-jakub

replies.bodyText: The functionality that this code expects in z/OSMF is planned to be supported forever.
